predicate.note: Frames file for 'counteract' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry. Comparison with 'prevent'.

roleset.name: work against, prevent

example.name: with instrument/manner
example.text: HomeFed had been one of the handful of large West Coast thrifts that in recent quarters *trace* had counteracted interest-rate problems dogging the industry by keeping a lid on problem assets and lending heavily into the furious California housing market.
example.arg: keeping a lid on problem assets and lending heavily into the furious California housing market

roleset.note: 'prevent' predicts an arg2 "secondary predication or action", but I don't think this will occur with 'counteract.'
